originalText.text: On my first visit to Dr. Alexander’s Barash office last Friday, everything was as smooth and efficient as can be. The office is immaculately organized, and there was virtually no wait time, which is very rare with ophthalmology appointments.  Dr. Barash was professional, patient, personable, transparent, and well-versed in his area of expertise. I went to him for a second opinion via a reference, and his comprehensive approach to the issue surpassed the original diagnosis. Moreover, the doctor took his time to unfold and expound upon the subtle nuances and intricacies, which was appreciated given his approach to the issue. His staff are very welcoming from the moment you enter the office and courteous. Overall, for my very first appointment everything was addressed in a timely and responsive manner and I was on my way. In totality, I  highly recommended Dr. Alexander Barash!

originalText.text: Dr. Barash is an incredibly compassionate and caring doctor. He takes time to help me understand the dynamics of my eye problem, recommends prescriptive approaches and explains each one in detail. He follows up and answers all of my questions no matter how small. I am struck by his depth of knowledge and ability to make the difficult medical information accessible.  I met a doctor in this field who claimed that as wonderful Dr. Barash is as a practitioner he is a marvel in the operating room. It was nice to have his colleagues reflect my views of him as a superb doctor. I have highly recommended him to my friends and feel blessed that i have Dr. Barash as my doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Alexander Barash went out of his way to give me an emergency checkup when I was coming from out of town during the weekend. He is a very skilled doctor who cares for his patients and explains everything in great detail. Would definitely love to see him again if I have the chance!

originalText.text: When my husband and I visited Dr. Barash about three years or more My husband was losing sight in both eyes. With surgery and care from Dr. Barash my husband has regain almost 20 20 in the right eye which enables him to function daily. Dr. Barash takes his time to explain all procedures and what he is doing he also listens and answer all questions we have. We have never felt rushed in his office and that is key for us. We will continue to visit Dr. Barash office. Thank you Doctor for all you did and continue to for My husband eyes.

originalText.text:
During an office visit to Dr. Barash, my mother received a complete and detailed examination of her eye. The doctor was very attentively to my mother and gave a detailed explanation (in simple terms, for better understanding) of her eye condition.
The office is new, very clean and fully equipped. Dr. Barash is a very knowledgeable specialist and a very detail -oriented person. Thank you doctor.
